argument.description: A string that specifies a security policy that exists at the current server (SQLSTATE 42704).
A string that specifies a security policy that exists at the current server (SQLSTATE 42704).

description: The SECLABEL function returns an unnamed security label with a data type of DB2SECURITYLABEL. Use the SECLABEL function to insert a security label with given component values without having to create a named security label.
